settings.question: Who is Gush?
settings.answer:
"Gush makes innovative materials for the built environment. Beyond sprucing up your home, our products support your wellbeing and help the Earth too.
We believe your choices, however small, can drive purposeful change. When we bring our actions together, big or small – we’re walking the path of true wellness. If this resonates with you, come be a part of our community.

For more information about our mission, click here. "
